Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: (LSMO)/metal interfaces are important for the application of LSMO as the cathode and the metal as the interconnector in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: Interfaces between LSMO and either Fecralloy, or Cr-5Fe-Y(2)O(3), or Pt metal were fabricated by using screen printing, followed by sintering at 1200 degreesC in different atmospheres.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: The microstructures of these LSMO/metal interfaces were examined using scanning electron microscopy (SEM) coupled with energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS) and X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical properties were characterised using impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: The LSMO/Fecralloy interface fabricated in air shows a high electrical resistance (about 10(5)
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: Ohm cm(2) at 800 degreesC) due to the formation of an interlayer consisting of alumina and the mixed oxide M(2)O(3).
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: nAl(2)O(3) at the interface during the fabrication process.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: When the interface was fabricated at 1200 degreesC in argon or vacuum, a thicker interfacial layer was formed compared with that formed in air.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: In addition, the La(0.8)Sr(0.2)MnO(3) decomposed into (La(0.8)Sr(0.2))(2)MnO(4+lambda), (La, Sr)(2)O(3) and MnO. Annealing of the specimen at 1200 degreesC for 5 h in air can partially reverse the decomposition.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: The interface resistance of the annealed sample across the interface is one order of magnitude lower than that of an interface fabricated in air.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: A thick Cr(2)O(3) layer was found at the LSMO/Cr-5Fe-Y(2)O(3) interface fabricated in air and a spinel phase (Mn, Cr)(3)O(4) formed a network surrounding LSMO grains due to the reaction between LSMO phase and CrO(3)
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: vapour released from the Cr(2)O(3) layer during the fabrication.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical resistances of both phases are high at room temperature, but become significantly lower at 400 degreesC. They can be negligible above 500 degreesC.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: However the evaporation of CrO(3) increases the resistivity of the LSMO layer.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs

Sentencas: No reaction or oxidation interlayer was found between LSMO and Pt metal producing an interface resistance of 0.52 Ohm cm(2) at room temperature.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterisation of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3/metal interfaces for application in SOFCs
